exceptions.exn: In environment A, X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y B : relation X HB : controlled TX TY B F, G : function X Y HF : monotonic TX TY F HG : wmonotonic TX TY G HBF : transparent B F HFG : forall R : relation2 X Y, incl (F R) (G R) HBG : contains (chaining_l (star B)) G R : relation2 X Y HRt : evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) (F R)) HRa : evolve_a TX TY R (G R) pre_silent : forall n : nat, evolve_t TX TY (UExp F R n) (comp (star B) (UExp F R (S n))) silent : evolve_t TX TY (comp (star B) (UIter F R)) (comp (star B) (UIter F R)) HFGn : forall n : nat, incl (UExp F R n) (UExp G R n) HBGGn : forall (R : relation2 X Y) (n : nat), incl (comp (star B) (UExp G R n)) (UExp G R (S n)) pre_visible : forall n : nat, evolve TX TY (UExp F R n) (UExp G R (2 + n)) visible : evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) (UIter F R)) (UIter G (comp (star B) (UIter F R))) HGGBF : eeq (UIter (UIter G) (comp (star B) (UIter F R))) (UIter (UIter G) R) X0 : Lbl A Y0, F0 : X R0 : Y H0 : TX X0 Y0 F0 H1 : UIter (UIter G) R Y0 R0 Unable to unify "wmonotonic ?M1512 ?M1513 (Union2 ?M1514 ?M1515)" with "exists2 y' : Y, Weak TY X0 R0 y' & UIter (UIter G) R F0 y'".

original: unfold simulation. unfold contains. unfold contains in HFG. unfold simulation_t in silent. unfold simulation_t in pre_silent. unfold simulation_t in silent. unfold simulation_t. intros X0 Y0 F0 R0 H0 H1. apply Union2_wmon;auto.
